line.text: Full many a glorious morning have I seen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Flatter the mountain tops with sovereign eye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Kissing with golden face the meadows green
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Gilding pale streams with heavenly alchemy
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Anon permit the basest clouds to ride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With ugly rack on his celestial face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And from the forlorn world his visage hide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Stealing unseen to west with this disgrace
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Even so my sun one early morn did shine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With all triumphant splendour on my brow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But out alack he was but one hour mine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The region cloud hath masked him from me now
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet him for this my love no whit disdaineth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Suns of the world may stain when heaven sun staineth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
